<img src="http://srvis.com/img/logo.png"/>
 
 LowEndTalk!   
 
 We're still moving forward with our $6.99/month for 1024MB Ram OpenVZ at our Metro-Detroit location. We're happy to have a bunch of people sign on to our first offer this month. So we will continue this great deal for a little more time. If you are interested please make sure to move fast as we are only going to be continuing this deal for a short period longer.
 
 If you have any comments or concerns please let us know. 
 
 **1024 OpenVZ Plan in Troy, Michigan**  
 -1024MB Ram  
 -1024MB vSwap  
 -750GB Bandwidth  
 -60GB Storage  
 -2 vCPU  
 -1 IPv4 Address  
 -100Mbit/s Port  
 -SAS-70 Audited Datacenter  
 -Branded Hardware  
 -Raid-10  
 -99.9% Uptime SLA  
 -7-Day Money Back  
 -SolusVM Control Panel  
 
 **For $6.99/month.**  
 **To order go to:** http://srvis.com/vm.php  
 
 **Contact Us:**
